apiError: Sorry but I couldn't retrieve your Netatmo weather station's data.
help: I'm here to help you retrieve measurements from your Netatmo weather station.
measurement: The %s is %s %s according to the sensor named %s.
measurementNotFound: %s is not available on the sensor named %s.

weatherStationNotFound: In order to use %s, you need to own a Netatmo weather station and have it linked to your Netatmo account.
